statements: UPDATE GenomicSequencingData SET patient_id = 100, mutation_type = 'Missense', chromosome_number = 2 WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE GenomicSequencingData SET gene_name = 'BRCA1', sequencing_data = '{"variant": "del", "frequency": 0.15}' WHERE sample_id = 2;
UPDATE GenomicSequencingData SET mutation_type = 'SNP', gene_name = 'BRCA1' WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE GenomicSequencingData SET patient_id = 1001, sequencing_data = '{"exon": "2", "amino_acid_change": "V456N"}' WHERE sample_id = 5;
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_type = 'Substitution', mutation_position = 42 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE patients SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_position = 50, gene_name = 'BCR-ABL', mutation_type = 'point' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE patients SET age = 35, diagnosis = 'Leukemia' WHERE gender = 'Male' AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_name = 'Deletion' WHERE mutation_id = 1;
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_type = 'Insertion' WHERE patient_id = 3;
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_name = 'COVID-19 Variant' WHERE mutation_id = 1
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_type = 'Insertion' WHERE patient_id = 123
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_position = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE patients SET gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 2;
UPDATE mutations SET gene_name='BRCA1', mutation_type='missense', mutation_position=123 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE patients SET date_of_birth='1990-05-15', blood_type='O+', gender='Male', patient_name='John Doe' WHERE patient_id=100;
UPDATE genomic_data SET mutation_name = 'G12D', mutation_type = 'Missense' WHERE sample_id = 101;
UPDATE sequencing_results SET quality_score = 95, sequencing_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE sample_id = 102;
UPDATE genomic_data SET mutation_type='Insertion' WHERE sample_id=1;
UPDATE patient_information SET address='123 Main St, City' WHERE patient_id=101;
